zeta.gun.las_16.desc:
A rifle that can instantly spray high-energy beams.If it overheats, a new radiator needs to be replaced
§eThanks:Desert
zeta.gun.plas_1.desc:
Plasma rifle, capable of firing a beam of superheated gas that detonates upon reaching the firing point. 
Please do not stand near the explosion site.
zeta.gun.gp31.desc: A handgun that fires grenades, must be reloaded after each shot.
zeta.gun.ac7.desc:
I love the BIG GUN
§eThanks:mel.low's animation
zeta.gun.br_14.desc: ​​§eSuper Earth salutes every Helldiver who stands resolute in the face of annihilation.
zeta.gun.railgun.desc: Experimental weapons that focus on armor piercing ability
zeta.gun.rl77.desc:
Wide-area bombing weapons require a little creativity......
§ebut also the awareness of being sent to heaven.
zeta.gun.p113.desc: History hangs high like a mirror, and its verdict will eventually be made
zeta.attachment.jet.desc:
It can bounce continuously and explode continuously at an appropriate angle
making it a good helper for clearing indoor spaces.
zeta.gun.sg8p.desc: Improved pump action weapon, but firing overheated plasma
zeta.gun.sg8.desc:
Dual magazine pump action weapon, suitable for clearing small targets
§eThanks: AmengyLoad's dual machines
zeta.gun.sg8s.desc:
Dual magazine single head bullet weapon, suitable for severely damaging medium-sized targets
§eThanks: AmengyLoad's dual machines
zeta.gun.sg451.desc:
Double magazine white phosphorus bullet weapon with extremely high repelling power
§eThanks: AmengyLoad's dual machines
zeta.gun.ar61.desc: It is a good day to die!
zeta.gun.p4.desc: A reliable heavy revolver that can deliver a fatal blow to enemies
zeta.gun.quasar.desc: A powerful energy weapon that must be recharged before use
zeta.gun.gr8.desc:
A hundred years ago, my ancestors were using Gustav to kill Cyborgs.
§eThanks:mel.low's animation
zeta.attachment.gr8_f.desc:
Incendiary bomb, please confirm that the explosion ignites the block,
and ensure that there are no significant flammable structures!
zeta.gun.arc12.desc:
This terrifying thing will generate an electric arc and shock the target directly in front,
no matter friend or foe
zeta.gun.ultimatum.desc:
Think twice before acting.
§4However, for those who have sacrificed their lives in Angel's Venture...
zeta.gun.las_5.desc:
A rifle capable of firing a continuous laser beam eliminates the need for reloading bullets.
§eThanks: Hamster Baron's logic machines&RABasya's animation
zeta.gun.gl21.desc: Chain grenade launcher, capable of effectively crushing small and medium-sized targets
zeta.gun.r6.desc:
Even after three centuries, the lever rifle still has its place.
§eThanks: Hamster Baron&Soret's animation and dual machines
zeta.gun.smg32.desc: Large caliber heavy submachine gun with great recoil, but capable of stopping enemies
zeta.gun.sg225sp.desc:
An automatic shotgun that sprays fan-shaped shotgun shells, capable of harvesting large pieces of enemies.
§eThanks:Koei's model&animation authorize
zeta.gun.sg20.desc: Dual magazine humanitarian weapon, capable of shoot flechette and non lethal ammunition
zeta.ammo.sg8f_ammo.desc: When fuel, oxidizer, and intense heat converge, blazing flames surge skyward.
zeta.block.terminal.name: Super Earth Wireless Terminal
zeta.block.terminal.desc:
§eOur way of life,Galaxy wide,
§epaved with the skull of those who've died
